name: buhoi
description: Because drunk people can create web apps too.
author: Constantin Titarenko <constantin.titarenko@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha -r should --recursive tests
scripts.cover: npm run lint && nyc mocha -r should --recursive tests && nyc report --reporter=html && xdg-open coverage/index.html
scripts.travis-coveralls: npm run lint && nyc mocha -r should --recursive tests && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.release-patch: npm t && npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.release-minor: npm t && npm version minor && npm publish && git push
scripts.release-major: npm t && npm version major && npm publish && git push
